org.apache.hbase.archetypes.exemplars.shaded_client

类 HelloHBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hbase.archetypes.exemplars.shaded_client.HelloHBase

  • public final class HelloHBase
extends Object
    Successful running of this application requires access to an active instance of HBase. For install instructions for a standalone instance of HBase, please refer to https://hbase.apache.org/book.html#quickstart

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      (专用程序包) static void createNamespaceAndTable(Admin admin)
      Invokes Admin#createNamespace and Admin#createTable to create a namespace with a table that has one column-family.
      (专用程序包) static void deleteNamespaceAndTable(Admin admin)
      Invokes Admin#disableTable, Admin#deleteTable, and Admin#deleteNamespace to disable/delete Table and delete Namespace.
      (专用程序包) static void deleteRow(Table table)
      Invokes Table#delete to delete test data (i.e. the row)
      (专用程序包) static void getAndPrintRowContents(Table table)
      Invokes Table#get and prints out the contents of the retrieved row.
      static void main(String[] args) 
      (专用程序包) static boolean namespaceExists(Admin admin, String namespaceName)
      Checks to see whether a namespace exists.
      (专用程序包) static void putRowToTable(Table table)
      Invokes Table#put to store a row (with two new columns created 'on the fly') into the table.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException

      • createNamespaceAndTable

        static void createNamespaceAndTable(Admin admin)
                             throws IOException
        Invokes Admin#createNamespace and Admin#createTable to create a namespace with a table that has one column-family.
        参数:
        admin - Standard Admin object
        抛出:
        IOException - If IO problem encountered

      • putRowToTable

        static void putRowToTable(Table table)
                   throws IOException
        Invokes Table#put to store a row (with two new columns created 'on the fly') into the table.
        参数:
        table - Standard Table object (used for CRUD operations).
        抛出:
        IOException - If IO problem encountered

      • getAndPrintRowContents

        static void getAndPrintRowContents(Table table)
                            throws IOException
        Invokes Table#get and prints out the contents of the retrieved row.
        参数:
        table - Standard Table object
        抛出:
        IOException - If IO problem encountered

      • namespaceExists

        static boolean namespaceExists(Admin admin,
                               String namespaceName)
                        throws IOException
        Checks to see whether a namespace exists.
        参数:
        admin - Standard Admin object
        namespaceName - Name of namespace
        返回:
        true If namespace exists
        抛出:
        IOException - If IO problem encountered

      • deleteRow

        static void deleteRow(Table table)
               throws IOException
        Invokes Table#delete to delete test data (i.e. the row)
        参数:
        table - Standard Table object
        抛出:
        IOException - If IO problem is encountered

      • deleteNamespaceAndTable

        static void deleteNamespaceAndTable(Admin admin)
                             throws IOException
        Invokes Admin#disableTable, Admin#deleteTable, and Admin#deleteNamespace to disable/delete Table and delete Namespace.
        参数:
        admin - Standard Admin object
        抛出:
        IOException - If IO problem is encountered
